Description: Consultant assesses client ICS infrastructure against IEC 62443 security levels, identifies gaps, and generates compliance reports
Key Steps: 1) Import client assets 2) Map to IEC 62443 zones 3) Assign security levels 4) Identify control gaps 5) Generate gap analysis report
Deliverables: IEC 62443 Gap Analysis Report, Control Matrix, Remediation Roadmap

Description: AI agent autonomously explores attack paths, selects exploits, simulates attacks, learns from results, and updates KG with findings
Key Steps: 1) Agent queries KG for target infrastructure 2) Discovers attack paths 3) Selects exploits from CAPEC/CVE 4) Simulates attack 5) Updates KG with results
Deliverables: Pentest Report, Exploited Vulnerabilities List, Attack Path Diagrams, Remediation Recommendations

Description: Model threats against client OT/IT infrastructure using STRIDE/MITRE, simulate attack scenarios, identify high-risk paths
Key Steps: 1) Model infrastructure in KG 2) Apply STRIDE categories 3) Map to MITRE techniques 4) Simulate attack scenarios 5) Generate threat model report
Deliverables: Threat Model Document, Attack Tree Diagrams, Risk Register, Mitigation Strategies

Description: Enrich SOC alerts with KG context, provide threat intelligence, suggest response actions based on attack path analysis
Key Steps: 1) SOC sends alert to API 2) Query KG for context 3) Identify related threats/assets 4) Return enriched data 5) Suggest response actions
Deliverables: Enriched Alert Data, Threat Context, Response Recommendations

Description: Link client assets to CVEs, prioritize based on risk score, track remediation, integrate with asset DB and CMMS
Key Steps: 1) Sync asset DB 2) Match CPE to CVEs 3) Calculate risk scores 4) Prioritize vulnerabilities 5) Track remediation status
Deliverables: Vulnerability Prioritization List, Remediation Tracking Dashboard, Risk Trend Reports

Description: Support incident response with real-time threat intel, playbooks, attack path context, and coordination tools
Key Steps: 1) Alert triggers IR workflow 2) Query KG for threat context 3) Retrieve relevant playbooks 4) Track incident timeline 5) Document lessons learned
Deliverables: Incident Timeline, Root Cause Analysis, Lessons Learned Report, Playbook Updates

Description: Design secure zone/conduit architectures for ICS, validate against IEC 62443, model attack surfaces, document controls
Key Steps: 1) Model client OT/IT architecture 2) Define zones/conduits 3) Map to IEC 62443 SLs 4) Validate control coverage 5) Generate architecture documentation
Deliverables: Security Architecture Diagram, Zone/Conduit Design, Control Specification, Design Review Report

Description: Map rail system components to ISO 57000 security requirements, generate handover documentation for owner/operator
Key Steps: 1) Import rail system inventory 2) Map to ISO 57000 requirements 3) Assess compliance 4) Generate security report 5) Create handover documentation
